definition: "fire" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 86), occurring in 熙, 然, 熊 etc
coke (processed coal used in blast furnace)
lit. badly burned about the head (from trying to put out a fire) (idiom)/fig. hard-pressed/under pressure (from a heavy workload, creditors etc)

sentences.english: The meat will scorch if you don't lower the gas.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不把煤气调小一点，肉就要焦了。

sentences.english: The analysis of the image quality on focus plate is very important in infrared seeker measurement.
sentences.chinese: 焦面上的成像质量分析是红外导引头测试的重要内容。

sentences.english: For large primary coma aberration, interference fringe presents.
sentences.chinese: 大的初级彗差使焦平面出现干涉条纹。

sentences.english: An indirectly determination of water content in sodium pyrosulphate is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种间接测定焦亚硫酸钠中水分含量的方法。

sentences.english: Especially the side of the barbeque pork with honey, contains aroma of charcoals , it's just so unique!
sentences.chinese: 尤其是带点焦的边位，更是有一股炭烤独有的香味。

sentences.english: Characteristics, applications and development of the uncooled IR focal plane arrays, pyroelectric FPAs, are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 热释电焦平面是一种非致冷型红外焦平面。

sentences.english: Mr. Jiao Ran acquaints himself with Mr. Ge Tao the producing process of teapot.
sentences.chinese: 焦部长正在向工艺师葛韬仔细了解紫砂壶的制作过程。

sentences.english: Currently, coal-based needle coke can be produced only in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 目前全球只有日本能生产优质煤系针状焦。

sentences.english: After both sides are fried to a golden brown, add tomato sauce and Parmesan cheese.
sentences.chinese: 茄子两面都变成焦黄色之后，加入番茄酱和巴马干酪。

sentences.english: Jiao Yanshou and Wang Zhaojun lived in the same time. Jiao Yanshou wrote two poems of Zhaojun.
sentences.chinese: 焦延寿和昭君是同时代的人，他写过两首咏昭君的诗。

sentences.english: The oak barrels give the whisky its caramel colour.
sentences.chinese: 橡木桶使威士忌的颜色变成焦糖色。

sentences.english: The floating element improves the quality in the near focussing range.
sentences.chinese: 其中的浮动元件改善了近焦范围内的象质。

sentences.english: By using stibnite direct preparation of sodium pyroantimonate the new process were studied and satisafactory results were obtained.
sentences.chinese: 介绍以辉锑矿为原料直接制备焦锑酸钠的新工艺。

sentences.english: The way how to improve the design of screw extruder used for hot briquetting process is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了热压型焦工艺设备螺旋挤压机设计改进情况。

sentences.english: The image is patched together from 44 shots, each having a different focal plane.
sentences.chinese: 这张图片理论上是由44张不同焦立体的照片分解的。

sentences.english: High quality caramel could improve the quality of dark soy sauce.
sentences.chinese: 认为酱油的感官指标受所加焦糖色品质的影响较大。

definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
refers to various monocotyledonous flowering plants including Acorus calamus and Typha orientalis/common cattail/bullrush
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
